snippet: A closer look at “Matrix,” 30-foot-long work by Keith Haring that is part of an exhibition of his art at the Brooklyn Museum.
abstract: Keith Haring's 30-foot-long work Matrix is part of an exhibition of his graffiti-based art at the Brooklyn Museum; exhibit strives to demonstrate the complexity and seriousness of Haring's vision.
lead_paragraph: A closer look at “Matrix,” 30-foot-long work by Keith Haring that is part of an exhibition of his art at the Brooklyn Museum.

headline.seo: Keith Haring’s Work at the Brooklyn Museum
headline.main: In Code: Spaceships, Babies, Evil TVs
headline.print_headline: In Code: Spaceships, Babies, Evil TVs
